author: jochembrouwer
content: Same RE: <@552133098075193354>, I would also lean to 3/6 instead of 2/4. It would make sense to get the tests match the devnet spec (otherwise you would need to manage "test"  and "devnet" versions of the spec to test/run it)

author: marioevz
content:
Yes that sounds good, you can actually fill tests that follows devnet 6 (only 4844 eip) using this branch: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/pull/139

I updated just today to include the data gas formula change but requires a modified geth branch also: https://github.com/marioevz/go-ethereum/tree/big-endian-pre-compile-vectors-rlp-txs

author: marioevz
content: Compiled BlockchainTest fixtures for devnet-6 in this file, contains up to PR https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/7154, _not_ including https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/7172

author: marioevz
content: Updated version which fixes some invalid genesis block headers <@508125616940515329>
